articles.title: Microsoft accidentally swapped Windows 11’s startup sound with Vista’s - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft has mistakenly replaced its Windows 11 boot sound with the chime from Vista. It’s a bug that will be fixed in the latest preview builds of the OS.

articles.title: AI alone cannot solve the productivity puzzle - Financial Times
articles.description: Economic miracles stem from discovery, not repeating tasks at greater speed

articles.title: Anker’s Soundcore Sleep earbuds finally feature active noise canceling - The Verge
articles.description: Anker’s Soundcore Sleep A30 earbuds now offer better nighttime noise blocking with ANC and a snore-detecting charging case.
